items.text: pushed back to the bowler
items.shortText: de Silva to Mushfiqur Rahim, no run

athlete.name: Akila Dananjaya
athlete.fullName: Mahamarakkala Kurukulasooriya Patabendige Akila Dananjaya Perera

items.text: chopped from outside off, might have been a googly, dinked past the left of short third man to the boundary
items.shortText: de Silva to Mushfiqur Rahim, FOUR runs

athlete.name: Akila Dananjaya
athlete.fullName: Mahamarakkala Kurukulasooriya Patabendige Akila Dananjaya Perera

items.text: tossed-up legbreak outside off, Mushfiq does not really meet the pitch of this turning ball and slices a drive square through the off side
items.shortText: de Silva to Mushfiqur Rahim, 2 runs

athlete.name: Akila Dananjaya
athlete.fullName: Mahamarakkala Kurukulasooriya Patabendige Akila Dananjaya Perera

items.preText: Sith: "Please bring BD fans who are in Mars back to earth. World Cup is in England and Wales. We know how bad they are in fast pitches.." --- England pitches aren't fast any more, and Bangladesh recently beat NZ in Eng in the Champions Trophy
items.text: full and straight, tapped down to long-on
items.shortText: de Silva to Mushfiqur Rahim, 1 run

athlete.name: Akila Dananjaya
athlete.fullName: Mahamarakkala Kurukulasooriya Patabendige Akila Dananjaya Perera

items.preText: Mahneel: "Is it just me or are the Lankans big boys strugglingg really hard with their fielding, particularly getting down to save boundaries at the last moment, Hathuru wont be happy"
items.text: half-tracker on middle, Shakib rocks back and pummels a pull to the midwicket boundary
items.postText: nishan: "Sri Lanka can't seem to buy a wicket at the moment, what is going on with this bowling "attack"??"
items.shortText: de Silva to Shakib Al Hasan, FOUR runs

athlete.name: Akila Dananjaya
athlete.fullName: Mahamarakkala Kurukulasooriya Patabendige Akila Dananjaya Perera

items.preText:
Thisara Perera replaces Dananjaya.

Ovy: "We are in earth actually. We have played last champions trophy semifinal at England & last worldcup quarter final at Australia. So, we can do it in England where pitch is pretty batting friendly."
items.text: full, wide, driven out to deep point
items.shortText: NLTC Perera to Mushfiqur Rahim, 1 run

items.preText: Sith: "Though all call it up on batsmen, i guess the real problem is with bowlers. We dont have a good pace attack. death bowling is 0. no proper spinners like Herath or Murali. we cant say we are in a transition period for ever. "
items.text: slower length ball on off, presses forward and defends into the off side
items.shortText: NLTC Perera to Shakib Al Hasan, no run

items.text: good length on off, shuffles across and defends back
items.shortText: NLTC Perera to Shakib Al Hasan, no run

items.text: full and wide, driven in front of mid-off for a very risky one. Direct hit could have had him in trouble. A streaky single to bring up the fifty. This has been a punishing knock
items.shortText: NLTC Perera to Shakib Al Hasan, 1 run

items.text: fullish, slower outside off, stabs it to point
items.shortText: NLTC Perera to Mushfiqur Rahim, no run

items.text: presses forward and crunches a punch to a fuller ball straight to covers
items.shortText: NLTC Perera to Mushfiqur Rahim, no run

items.text: full and little bit of flight on middle and off, drilled to midwicket
items.shortText: de Silva to Shakib Al Hasan, no run

items.text: through mid-off diving to his right. This is an ugly shot. Reaches out way away from the body and slashes at this to send it flying past the fielder at mid-off who runs across and gets down
items.shortText: de Silva to Shakib Al Hasan, FOUR runs

items.text: short, wide, shifts back and cuts past the right of point. Bangladesh's 200 comes up
items.shortText: de Silva to Shakib Al Hasan, 2 runs

items.text: backs away to a shortish ball and slaps it back
items.shortText: de Silva to Shakib Al Hasan, no run

items.text: short and wide, punched to sweeper cover
items.shortText: de Silva to Shakib Al Hasan, 1 run

items.text: this one's pitched up around off and Rahim leans into a driven down to long-off
items.shortText: de Silva to Mushfiqur Rahim, 1 run

items.text: slower length ball at 123.9ks, flicked to deep midwicket and the fielder there fumbles a simple save to allow an easy second run
items.shortText: NLTC Perera to Mushfiqur Rahim, 2 runs

items.text: short of a length around off, hangs back and opens the face to covers
items.shortText: NLTC Perera to Mushfiqur Rahim, no run

items.text: how has that carried for six?! Not quite a half-tracker, just a back of a length delivery and Rahim advances before slapping it over long-off for a clean six. Good timing
items.shortText: NLTC Perera to Mushfiqur Rahim, SIX runs

items.text: short ball, gets on top and crunches a pull to deep midwicket
items.shortText: NLTC Perera to Mushfiqur Rahim, 2 runs

items.text: full, curving in from outside off, driven to sweeper cover neatly
items.shortText: NLTC Perera to Mushfiqur Rahim, 1 run

items.text: short of a length, pitches outside leg, shovels it off the pads through backward square leg
items.shortText: NLTC Perera to Shakib Al Hasan, 1 run

items.text: short of a length on middle, jumps back and turns it away to midwicket
items.shortText: Lakmal to Shakib Al Hasan, 1 run

items.text: hangs back and waits for this shorter one before opening the face to guide it to third man
items.shortText: Lakmal to Mushfiqur Rahim, 1 run
